message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $14,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 represents a fair price, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this is a very competitive offer considering the value this product provides.
